summary:
Food is kinda weak in vanilla skyrim. It\'s not really an alternative to potions, but I think it should be. Now all you warrior types don\'t have to bother with studying magic at all.
Just eat a salmon steak or some yummy rabbit. Cooking is finally worth the trouble.
descriptionHtml:
Food is kinda weak in vanilla skyrim. It\'s not really an alternative to potions, but I think it should be. Now all you warrior types don\'t have to bother with studying magic at all.
Just eat a salmon steak or some yummy rabbit. Cooking is finally worth the trouble.
---------------------------------------------

Changes:

This mod alters most of the vanilla foods to give them more powerful effects. In my opinion, it gives the player a reason to hunt and fish. Also, it acts as an alternative to potion making for warrior type characters.

Detailed Changes:
=========================================
Gourd: Restore Health 5 pts
Honey: Restore Health 1 pts duration 30
Black Briar Reserve: Restore Stamina 50, Damage Stamina Rate 40
Elsweyr Fondue: Fortify Magicka Rate 25, Fortify Magicka 100
Vegetable Soup: Restore Health 1 Duration 720, Resotre Stamina 1 Duration 720
Venison Step: Restore Stamina 30, Restore Health and Stamina Duration 720
Tomato Soup: Restore Health and Stamina 30
Cabbage Potato Soup: Resotre Health 30 and Restore Stamina 45
Horker Stew: Restore Stamina and Health 50, Restore Health 1 Duration 720
Beef Stew: Restore Stamina 50, Restore Stamina 2 Duration 720
Grilled Chicken Breast: Restore Health 25
Chicken Breast: Restore Health 5
Dog Meat: Restore Health 5
Cabbage Soup: Restore health and stamina 20
Apple Cabbage Stew: Restore Stamina 30, Restore Health 20
Charred Skeever Meat: Restore Health 10
Spiced Beef: Restore Health 30
Cyrodilic Brandy: Restore Stamina 100, Damage Stamina Rate 50
Spiced Wine: Restore Stamina 50, Damage Stamina Rate 25
Pheseant Roast: Restore Health 25
Rabbit Haunch: Restore Health 25
Horse Haunch: Restore Health 30
Venision Chop: Restore Health 35
Mammoth Steak: Restore Health 50
Horker Loaf: Restore Health 20
Leg of Goat Roast: Restore Health 35
Cooked Beef: Restore Health 30
Leek: Restore Health 3
Mammoth Snout: Restore Health 20
Mammoth Cheese Bowl: Restore Health 25, Restore Stamina 40
Venison: Restore Health 35
Salmon Meat: Restore Health 5
Rabbit Leg: Restore Health 3
Pheasant Breast: Restore Health 3
Horse Meat: Restore Health 3
Horker Meat: Restore Health 3
Leg of Goat: Restore Health 3
Raw Beef: Restore Health 3
Bread: Restore Health 10
Cliff Racer: Restore Stamina 30
White Gold Tower: Restore Stamina 50
Velvet LeChance: Restore Stamina 35
Apple Pie: Restore Health 20
Tomato: Restore Health 2
Potato: Restore Health 2
Carrot: Restore Health 2
Cabbage: Restore Health 3
Grilled Leeks: Restore Health 10
Sweet Roll: Restore Health 15
Seared Slaughterfish:  Restore Health 20
Salmon Steak:  Restore Health 30
Baked Potatoes: Restore Health 1 Duration 10, Restore Health 5
Long Taffy Treat: Restore Health 10, Restore Stamina 15
Honey Nut Treat: Restore Health 25
Sliced Eidar Cheese: Restore Health 20
Sliced Goat Cheese: Restore Health 20
Eidar Cheese Wheel: Restore Health 30
Goat Cheese Wheel: Restore Health 30
Eidar Cheese Wedge: Restore Health 10
Goat Cheese Wedge: Restore Health 10
Boiled Creme Treat: Restore Health 15, Restore Health 1 Duration 10
Green Apple: Restore Health 5
Red Apple: Restore Health 5
Dragon\'s Breath Mead: Restore Stamina 40, Damage Stamina Rate 25
Honningbrew Mead:Restore Stamina 30, Damage Stamina Rate 25, Restore Health 1 Duration 30, Fortify Health 30
Ale: Restore Stamina 15, Damage Stamina Rate 25
Nord Mead: Restore Stamina 20, Damage Stamina Rate 30, Resist Frost 5
Black-Briar Mead: Restore Stamina 25, Damage Stamina Rate 40, Fortify Magicka 10, Fortify Magicka Rate 25
=========================================

Installation:
Drop the following esp files into your Data folder in your Skyrim directory. 
-Yummy in Your Tummy.esp

---------------------------------------------

Uninstallation:
Delete the above esp file from your Data folder in your Skyrim directory.
---------------------------------------------

Compatibility:
This mod only alters the recipes for items at the cooking spit, so it should be compatible with any other mod that does not alter the same recipes. Other mods that add new recipes should work with it perfectly.
---------------------------------------------

Future Plans:
I\'ll continue to evaluate the items and maker balance alterations as necessary. 
---------------------------------------------

Errors and Bugs:
Please report any inconsistencies or error on the comments section for this topic or private message me. I\'ll be glad to fix them as soon as possible. Thanks!

---------------------------------------------

DO NOT REUPLOAD MY MOD ANYWHERE!!!! THAT MAKES ME A SAD PANDA!!!
FEEL FREE TO ALTER IT FOR YOUR PERSONAL USE, BUT CONTACT ME IF YOU WISH TO INCORPORATE IT INTO YOUR MOD. Thanks. :)
author: SteepledHat
